content: I don’t want liberal or conservative justices on the Supreme Court. Either way, there is something they wish to limit freedom on. Abortion for conservatives for example and guns for liberals for example. So, either way you get half your freedom. That is why I vote Libertarian. I want all my freedom. So, maybe the answer is a Libertarian nominee so that everyone gets all their freedom not just the ones the conservatives or liberals decide to “kindly” grant.
